title: Act
description: A thing or set of things to do

description.description: Any extra information about the act

when.description: The time of day the act is expected to take place

duration.description: An expected duration for the act; also is the default expected duration for subordinate acts

reminder.description: An expected reminder interval for the act; also is the default reminder interval for subordinate acts

next.description: The id of the act to take place immediately following this act before returning to normal order

ritual.description: If this is an actionable step  to be shown to the user or  a ritual
